## üéØ How to Use

### For Immediate Use:

**Option 1: Word Documents (Recommended)**
- Open `PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION.docx` in Microsoft Word
- Open `USER_MANUAL.docx` in Microsoft Word
- Both files are fully formatted with table of contents
- Can be edited, printed, or converted to PDF

**Option 2: HTML Documents**
- Open `PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION.html` in any web browser
- Open `USER_MANUAL.html` in any web browser
- Fully self-contained with styling
- Easy to navigate with clickable table of contents

**Option 3: Markdown Documents**
- View `PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION.md` in any text editor
- View `USER_MANUAL.md` in any text editor
- Best for developers and version control
- Can be viewed on GitHub with formatting

---

## üìÑ Creating PDF Files

PDF files were not automatically generated because it requires LaTeX installation (which needs administrator password).

### Easy Methods (No Installation):

**Method 1: Microsoft Word** (Recommended)
1. Open `.docx` file in Word
2. File ‚Üí Save As ‚Üí PDF
3. Done!

**Method 2: Google Docs**
1. Upload `.docx` to Google Drive
2. Open with Google Docs
3. File ‚Üí Download ‚Üí PDF

**Method 3: Browser Print**
1. Open `.html` file in Chrome/Safari
2. Press Cmd+P (Print)
3. Save as PDF

**Detailed instructions:** See `PDF_GENERATION_INSTRUCTIONS.md`

## üîç Key Highlights

### Project Documentation Covers:

‚úÖ **Complete Feature Set:**
- User authentication and profile management
- Multi-account support (9 account types)
- Transaction management with categories and tags
- Budget tracking and alerts
- Financial goal setting
- Recurring transactions
- EMI calculation and reminders
- PDF report generation
- Home screen widget
- Local notifications

‚úÖ **Technical Architecture:**
- Model-View-Provider (MVP) pattern
- SQLite database with 7 tables
- Provider-based state management
- Clean architecture principles
- Security implementations
- Data flow diagrams

‚úÖ **Database Design:**
- Complete schema for all 7 tables
- Relationship diagrams
- Migration history (v1-v9)
- CRUD operations
- Foreign key relationships

‚úÖ **Implementation Details:**
- EMI calculation formulas
- Net worth computation
- Budget tracking logic
- Notification scheduling
- PDF generation process
- Widget update mechanism

### User Manual Covers:

‚úÖ **Getting Started:**
- Installation steps (Android & iOS)
- Account creation
- First-time setup

‚úÖ **All Features:**
- Detailed instructions for every feature
- Screenshots descriptions
- Step-by-step procedures
- Tips and best practices

‚úÖ **Support:**
- Troubleshooting for common issues
- FAQ with 30+ questions
- Quick reference guides
- Contact information
